flashtype: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
shutterspeeds: 1/4000-1 sec. 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
lenstype: NIKKOR glass lens 12 elements in 10 groups (2 ED lens elements) 4.3-21.5mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 24-120mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
imagestabilization: Combination of Lens-shift and Electronic VR (still pictures)
flashrange: [W]: 0.5 to 5.2m (1 ft. 8 in. to 17 ft.) [T]: 0.5 to 4.5m (1 ft. 8 in. to 14 ft.)
feature: Waterproof, shockproof and freezeproof Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing and remote camera control with a compatible smartphone or tablet Built-in GPS, mapping, Electronic Compass and Points of Interest (POI) for creating amazing photo journals Full HD 1080p videos with stereo sound for dazzling movies
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 or 2 seconds duration
scenemodes: Back Light Beach Black and White Copy Close Up Dusk/Dawn Fireworks Show Food Landscape Museum Night Landscape Night Portrait Panorama Assist Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Scene Auto Selector Snow Sports Sunset Underwater
continuousshooting: Up to 5 shots at approx. 6.9 frames per second
